title: A compendium of all-in-one solar-driven water splitting using ZnIn2S4-based photocatalysts: guiding the path from the past to the limitless future
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,10080-10146
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS01040F, Review Article
Wei-Kean Chong, Boon-Junn Ng, Lling-Lling Tan, Siang-Piao Chai
We discuss the unique properties of zinc indium sulfide associated with the exploitation of multifarious material design strategies to realise sustainable solar-driven overall water splitting for green hydrogen production.
